name: twist-backend-api
description: API with Node.js and Oracle Database to get person/vitals infomatin

scripts.docs: node replace-string.js && apidoc -e node_modules -c config/apidoc-config -i ./ -o docs/apidoc && apidoc -e node_modules -c config/apidoc2-config -i ./ -o docs/apidoc2 -t template/
scripts.devdocs: apidoc -e node_modules -c config/apidoc-config -i ./ -o docs/apidoc && apidoc -e node_modules -c config/apidoc2-config -i ./ -o docs/apidoc2 -t template/
